Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $20.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

4 Pack of Homyhoo Potato Grow Bags

Fabric grow bags are much better at controlling the temperature and water content of your growing medium than traditional plastic pots. In the cold, the fabric will keep your plant warmer, and in the hot sun your plant will be kept cooler, so it doesn’t overheat. (ps: fabric bags may need more frequent watering, it’s because of the porous material which is less likely to hold in excess water as the old plastic pot materials do.)

Planting Tips

1. Moisten the soil and compost mix thoroughly. Fill about 1/3 full (6″-8″ deep) with a 50/50 mixture of garden soil and compost.

2. Evenly space 3 to 5 seed potatoes and/or pieces (“eyes up” ) and cover with 3 inches of soil.

3. As the potatoes continue growing, continue adding soil/compost mix until you reach the top of the grow bag.

4. Water regularly. During hot and dry summer days, potato plants should be watered once every 2 to 3 days. During cooler days with rainfall, potatoes may not need watering at all.

5. Look for signs when the leaves start yellowing and the stems wilt. Then stop watering and wait a week or two. Potatoes are ready for harvesting when more than 50% of the leaves have turned yellow.

Air Pruning Function

Fabric grow bags help to alleviate the issue because as the roots meet the edges of the fabric pot, they sense the drier soil that is exposed to the air. At this point, they know they have reached their growth limit. The roots become “air pruned” which is vital to growing healthy plants in containers. You will also get many more fibrous roots when air pruned. A more fibrous root system (many small root tips) allows the plants to take in more nutrients and water.

Premium Material: Made of breathable double layer non-woven fabric, material is heavy duty felt, the bag ensures good ventilation to prevent excessive moisture, also provide more oxygen for your plants. The strong and biodegradable material can prolong the service life of the bags, at the same time cause no pollution.
Convenient Design: These grow bag comes with large harvest window, through which you can check your plant and easily harvest veggies. These grow bags are made of sturdy material to ensure you may move around the bags filled with soil.
Large Capacity: These vegetable grow bags with large capacity of 10 gallons allow to grow veggies as much as you want. Thanks to the large size, it will create a stable growing environment for veggies and flowers.
Easy to Move: The strong handles make them easy to move around as your needs. These potato grow bags are perfect to use at patios, gardens, balconies, sunrooms and any indoor/outdoor space. They can be used to grow potato, onions, taro, radish, carrots and other vegetables.
Easy to Store and Reuse: The bags can be easily fold up and won’t take up much space when storing. Easily move and flap the lid to harvest potatoes without much effort. Please put about 4 to 6 seeds in each bag. At the end of the growing season, you may empty the bags, simply clean them and store dry.

4 Pack of Homyhoo Potato Grow Bags

Fabric grow bags are much better at controlling the temperature and water content of your growing medium than traditional plastic pots. In the cold, the fabric will keep your plant warmer, and in the hot sun your plant will be kept cooler, so it doesn’t overheat. (ps: fabric bags may need more frequent watering, it’s because of the porous material which is less likely to hold in excess water as the old plastic pot materials do.)

Planting Tips

1. Moisten the soil and compost mix thoroughly. Fill about 1/3 full (6″-8″ deep) with a 50/50 mixture of garden soil and compost.

2. Evenly space 3 to 5 seed potatoes and/or pieces (“eyes up” ) and cover with 3 inches of soil.

3. As the potatoes continue growing, continue adding soil/compost mix until you reach the top of the grow bag.

4. Water regularly. During hot and dry summer days, potato plants should be watered once every 2 to 3 days. During cooler days with rainfall, potatoes may not need watering at all.

5. Look for signs when the leaves start yellowing and the stems wilt. Then stop watering and wait a week or two. Potatoes are ready for harvesting when more than 50% of the leaves have turned yellow.

Fabric grow bags help to alleviate the issue because as the roots meet the edges of the fabric pot, they sense the drier soil that is exposed to the air. At this point, they know they have reached their growth limit. The roots become “air pruned” which is vital to growing healthy plants in containers. You will also get many more fibrous roots when air pruned. A more fibrous root system (many small root tips) allows the plants to take in more nutrients and water.

From the brand

Bring Nature To Your Home

We are committed to sharing the joy of gardening and promoting care for nature.

Amazing Creation has a mission of spreading the joy of gardening and promoting a love of nature by offering simple yet modern and elegant, easy-to-use, save spacer, colorful, versatile placement options, BPA free, weather-resistant, and innovative design. We’ve designed our planters to function efficiently in taking care of your plants and nature.

Stackable Planter

Save space by growing vertically. These unique pots are designed to be able to stacked upon one another, saving your valuable space!

Self Watering Planter

Self-watering pot that you can leave for up to 2 weeks. Provides a constant water supply that help your plants thrive.

Round Garden Planters

Featuring a stone blast finish and a modern, round design. Perfect choice for your favorite floral arrangements!

Bamboo Roasting Sticks

Multipurpose 30-inch bamboo roasting sticks, perfect to keep your children at a safe distance from the open flame.

From the brand

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, that’s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

Raised Garden Bed

POTEY PLANT STAND & SHELF

POTEY Raise Beds

Create Beautiful Green Garden

【Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouse】This galvanized raised garden bed kit contains a planting bed, a greenhouse, and 2 greenhouse covers. With our perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year. POTEY raised garden beds size: 5.4 L * 1.6 W *0.8 H (FT), greenhouse cover size: 2.3 W * 2.5 H (FT).
【2 Different Use Greenhouse Cover】POTEY raised garden bed come with PE cover and PE net, PE cover used for winter, to keep warm, and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperature; PE net used for summer, to protect your vegetables and plants while ventilating.
【Innovative Soil Ventilation Holes】Creating a planting environment in a plant box is different from the natural environment, where soil respiration is vital. Our plant box is equipped with vent holes that can replace fresh oxygen, making sure the plant roots grow well and strong.
【Strong Connecting rods】In order to keep the garden box more stable, we added 2 connecting rods in the middle of the garden box. Compared to other planting beds without rods or using thin iron sheets as rods, our connecting rods are more durable and have a long service life.
【Thickened Material】Galvanized raised garden beds are made of solid steel plates galvanized layer which average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time. If you have any problems during use, please feel free to contact us, and we will solve your problems ASAP.

POTEY Galvanized Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouse

Why Choose Potey?

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, that’s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

More reasons you’ll love this raised garden bed:

With Two Different Use Greenhouse Covers – The raised garden bed is equipped with a PE cover to keep plants warm in winter and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperatures; equipped with a PE net used in summer to protect plants from insects.

High-Quality Thickened Material – The raised garden bed outdoor is made of solid steel plates galvanized layer, the average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time, and is resistant to corrosion. Maintains its original shape even after many years of use.

Easy to Installation – This planter box outdoors is easy to install, with instructions detailing every step of the product’s installation details and a clear and concise installation video to assist you with the installation.

POTEY-GARDEN BEDS KIT PACKAGING INCLUDES:
  • Straight iron sheet * 6
  • Curved iron sheet * 4
  • Connecting rod * 2
  • Installed screw * 1 （box）
  • Clamps * 8
  • PE Plant Fabric * 2
  • Greenhouse Hoops * 4
  • PVC Transparent Pipe * 3

POTEY Raised Garden Beds with Cover

Two practical protective covers

POTEY continuously optimizes its products based on market research and customer feedback; this upgraded planter boxes outdoor has 2 different greenhouse covers to meet the growing needs of plants throughout the year.

POTEY found that plant lovers would like to have their own open space to experience planting and explore plant secrets. At this time, POTEY garden beds are the best choice.

  • ADVANTAGE – Surround air vents on all sides
  • ADVANTAGE – Suitable for growing needs of any plant
  • ADVANTAGE – Reasonably sized for most usage scenarios
  • ADVANTAGE – Strong connecting rod ensures long-term stability
  • ADVANTAGE – All parts are made of more than 0.6mm metal materials

Read more

SHOW BETTER PRODUCT DETAILS

Multiple Sets of Vent Holes

  • Simulate natural land respiration
  • Make sure the soil has enough oxygen during plant growth
  • Avoid soil compaction

Metal Material

  • Galvanized
  • More than 6mm thickness
  • Overall solid steel material
  • Not easy to corrode, rust

Strong Connecting Rods

  • Ensuring that the garden bed does not deform during long-term use
  • Most garden beds do not have rods, they will deform, fall apart, and collapse under long-term soil compression

Read more

PE cover for winter warmth

The combination of the galvanized raised garden bed and the PE greenhouse cover ensures that the plants are kept warm in the cold winter, preventing the vegetables and plants from being affected by the low temperature.

PE net for summer insect control

Build a PE net outside the raised garden bed, which can not only keep the planter boxes outdoor ventilated and easily absorb water, but also protect the plants from insects.

2 Different Use Greenhouse Covers

With this perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year.

Product Description

Purifying the air and good for health

XXXFLOWER is committed to the design and production of DIY decorations for garden, home, office, kitchen and bathroom. The design style is retro and charming, adding a simple and classic feel to your living space.

Perfect Combination

Natural wood has a unique textures, light but firm, high transparent borosilicate glass is smooth without scratches,allowing you to observe the growth of plants more clearly. Great for growing houseplants and can purify indoor air and good for health

More Stable Design

The metal swivel holder passes through the glass bulb, which is convenient to change the water and not easy to knock over.Propagates your plant’s babies in style, slim glass container provides plenty of room for plant’s roots and all are visible for observing its growth condition.

Best Patio Decoration

Super Stability and Smooth

Planter Tips

Retro wooden plant propagation station glass for Desktop , perfect for growing plants houseplants, for example water plants or fern.

You can use your imagination to your heart’s content with the plants you like.
